field_text.value:
My name is Stuart Clark,

I'm an Australian technophile, partner of 1 and parent of 2.

A Drupal developer by trade and choice, having first started using Drupal around 15 years ago and never having found a reasons to stop. I've built and contributed to hundreds of modules over those years, and will continue doing so in the future.

I'm a partner at Realityloop, Drupal specialists based in Victoria, Australia, where I've been working with clients and the community for over 10 years.

As well as being a Drupalist, I'm a strong proponent of Vue.js and Nuxt.js, both of which I have been using for around 4 years. While Drupal brings a lot of power to the backend, Vue and Nuxt bring what Drupal lacks to the Frontend.

And I'm the creator and lead developer DruxtJS.
